description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Caen vs Metz in the Ligue 2
title: Caen vs Metz: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head
title_page: Caen vs Metz: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
